overview: Suran married to love without a fight, and her husband 'Sungsik' had a dual character. Suran falls in love with his charm and starts to meet secretly and starts to love. Suran's love is getting bigger and bigger, and as much love as her love is starting to come out. One day, Chung-gi tells Suran to kill her husband and get married. As a result, Suran is captured by another desire.
title: Hot Desire
